Text: Re TCO Storage Contracts Cc a master agreement for the storages Contract and then list the individual agreements to allocate costs Contract acts as a balancing agreement to tell you what is available There will never be charges on they will always be on the individual contracts on PM Please respond to To Paul OLUMBIAGAS cc Scott OLUMBIAGAS Subject TCO Storage Contracts I understand that contract is the retail FSS contract with a total capacity of I bill CES Retail for the demand charges on this What is FSS contract

Re OR JAN NOMthey tell this is on Tennessee on AM Please respond to To Paul OLUMBIAGAS cc Subject Re OR JAN NOM Which pipe on AM To Dan CT Chris CT cc Subject OR JAN NOM Forwarded by Paul DrexeliusCESColumbiaGas on AM Heidi Boyd AM To Karen olumbiaGas Noel olumbiaGas Paul olumbiaGas cc Phil olumbiaGas Subject OR JAN NOM Hi Karen I need dthday of firm gas flowing to OR in Jan Sorry for the late notice

jan spreadsheetis the TCo needs sheet guys its the biggest and sometimes the most fun Forwarded by Paul DrexeliusCESColumbiaGas on AM Joann Collins PM To Paul olumbiaGas cc Subject jan spreadsheet JanDailyEstxls

FINAL JANUARY NEEDSForwarded by Paul DrexeliusCESColumbiaGas on PM KIM NOVSEK BIZIK PM To Morgan olumbiaGas Dale Ray olumbiaGas Phil olumbiaGas Darren olumbiaGas cc Noel olumbiaGas Paul olumbiaGas Marianne olumbiaGas Joanne olumbiaGas Subject FINAL JANUARY NEEDS Good Afternoon my mistake below in regards to the Peco volumes the PECOPAGas needs to be proven as Pa Gas therefore please have nominated from CNG Finnefrock Please contact me if you have any questions ANR CGE deliveries to Springboro dthday LDC Nom Deadline is on the th note this can be served off TGT Tetco BUG dthday LDC Nom Deadline is noon on the th Con Ed dthday estimate ONLY LDC Nom Deadline is pm on the th PECO dthday Monday Friday and dthday Saturday and Sunday LDC Nom Deadline is noon on the th PECOPAGas dthday Monday Friday and dthday Saturday and Sunday PSEG dthday LDC Nom Deadline is pm on the th Etown dthday LDC Nom Deadline is noon on the th NJN dthday LDC Nom Deadline is est on the th CNG PA gas for PECO day If we have a problem flowing this much please let me know as soon as possible so we can buy delivered gas to PECOs gate from one of the other suppliers Transco LILCO dthday capacity release is also for LDC Nom Deadline is noon on the th PSEG dthday LDC Nom Deadline is pm on the th S Jersey dthday Transco nom must show Enduser to be confirmed LDC Deadline is on the th Piedmont dthday LDC Nom Deadline was est on the nd just need activity number now PSNC dthday CES will get the capacity release for this from PSNC The supply will be from PSNCs pool this is their station pool Texas Gas DPL dthday LDC Nom Deadline is est on the th CGE dthday LDC Nom Deadline is on the th note this can be served off TGT

FINAL JANUARY NEEDSForwarded by Paul DrexeliusCESColumbiaGas on AM KIM NOVSEK BIZIK AM To Morgan olumbiaGas Dale Ray olumbiaGas Phil olumbiaGas Darren olumbiaGas cc Noel olumbiaGas Paul olumbiaGas Marianne olumbiaGas Joanne olumbiaGas Subject FINAL JANUARY NEEDS Good Morning As per my conversation with Noel this morning he will be getting back to be whether CGE will be served off ANR or TGT I have space of dth at Springboro as per CGE I have my PECO numbers listed below in purple ANR CGE deliveries to Springboro dthday LDC Nom Deadline is on the th note this can be served off TGT Tetco BUG dthday LDC Nom Deadline is noon on the th Con Ed dthday estimate ONLY LDC Nom Deadline is pm on the th PECO dthday Monday Friday and dthday Saturday and Sunday LDC Nom Deadline is noon on the th PECOPAGas dthday Monday Friday and dthday Saturday and Sunday PSEG dthday LDC Nom Deadline is pm on the th Etown dthday LDC Nom Deadline is noon on the th NJN dthday LDC Nom Deadline is est on the th CNG PA gas for PECO day If we have a problem flowing this much please let me know as soon as possible so we can buy delivered gas to PECOs gate from one of the other suppliers Transco LILCO dthday capacity release is also for LDC Nom Deadline is noon on the th PSEG dthday LDC Nom Deadline is pm on the th S Jersey dthday Transco nom must show Enduser to be confirmed LDC Deadline is on the th Piedmont dthday LDC Nom Deadline was est on the nd just need activity number now PSNC dthday CES will get the capacity release for this from PSNC The supply will be from PSNCs pool this is their station pool Texas Gas DPL dthday LDC Nom Deadline is est on the th CGE dthday LDC Nom Deadline is on the th note this can be served off TGT

Re January Volumeis to offset TCO volumes only on PM Please respond to To Paul OLUMBIAGAS cc Subject Re January Volume What pipe is this off of or is it split up between several on PM To Dan CT Chris CT cc Subject January Volume Forwarded by Paul DrexeliusCESColumbiaGas on PM Heidi Boyd PM To Lori Bunce ailfax cc Noel olumbiaGas Paul olumbiaGas John olumbiaGas Subject January Volume Hi Lori I believe we are still pulling our Local Production from you behind NYSEG please let me know ASAP if you disagree I am going to pull dthsday again let me know if this creates a problem for you Thanks

January Tennessee to WKYForwarded by Paul DrexeliusCESColumbiaGas on AM Marianne Stiles AM To Karen olumbiaGas cc Noel olumbiaGas Paul olumbiaGas Phil olumbiaGas Scott olumbiaGas Subject January Tennessee to WKY Any word on ks yet

NUMBERSForwarded by Paul DrexeliusCESColumbiaGas on AM Heidi Boyd PM To Joann olumbiaGas Joni olumbiaGas cc Noel olumbiaGas Paul olumbiaGas Subject NUMBERS Hi Everybody I havent input my CPA numbers yet I am still sorting them into market areas I am not sure that my numbers are correct due to production and wholesale issues I am hoping to have a couple of people look over my work but so far they have been unavailable when I finally got my numbers together I appreciate your patience and apologize for the inconvenience Thanks

TRANSCO behind CGV JAN Forwarded by Paul DrexeliusCESColumbiaGas on AM Heidi Boyd PM To Noel olumbiaGas Paul olumbiaGas cc Subject TRANSCO behind CGV JAN Hi Noel and Paul I dont know who else to copy on this please forward it to them and cc me if you dont mind I need dthsday total to be sent to CGV for three of my customers in Jan Thanks

Re NIMO JAN this is capacity we got from NIMO as part of a peaking deal with them they can call on gas delivered to their gatethey reimburse for all cost at a north point gas daily price plus transport We in essance can sell the capacity off on a monthly basis sell it delivered NIMO would not allow us to use this as part of our transport to our enduses though we also have capacity for that on PM Please respond to To John Hodge NOTESjwhodgeLMSOV Paul OLUMBIAGAS cc Subject Re NIMO JAN How much of the NIMO capacity about day of North to North was dedicated to retail From what Im seeing the retail volumes are looking fairly small on PM To Dan CT Chris CT cc Subject NIMO JAN Here are some more Forwarded by Paul DrexeliusCESColumbiaGas on PM Heidi Boyd PM To Morgan olumbiaGas cc Noel olumbiaGas Paul olumbiaGas Subject NIMO JAN FINAL Hi Morgan Please schedule the following in DTHs off of CNG to Niagra Mohawk Pooled East Meter day West Meter day Balanced East Meter day firm West Meter day Thanks

FINAL Tco Volumes for January on MountaineerForwarded by Paul DrexeliusCESColumbiaGas on PM KIM NOVSEK BIZIK PM To Joann olumbiaGas cc Marianne olumbiaGas Joanne olumbiaGas Noel olumbiaGas Paul olumbiaGas Jill olumbiaGas Subject FINAL Tco Volumes for January on Mountaineer Good Afternoon On TCOs K for the month of January I need the following FINAL volumes St Albans facility is dth per day Charleston facility is dth per day Please contact me if you have any questions

Final CNG to EOG January deliveries RevisedForwarded by Paul DrexeliusCESColumbiaGas on PM Marianne Stiles PM To Morgan olumbiaGas cc Noel olumbiaGas Paul olumbiaGas Brian olumbiaGas Frank olumbiaGas Subject Final CNG to EOG January deliveries Revised This is slightly revised EOG I will not need any CNG gas for East Ohio I will be using most of the Sempra dth per day gas dth for my FRPS pool and dth for my GRPS pool This will leave dth of the Sempra gas for you to sell Please let me know to whom we are selling that to as soon as possible as I need to release the gate space Please let me know if you need any additional info Thanks

FINAL January Tn Zn volumesForwarded by Paul DrexeliusCESColumbiaGas on PM Marianne Stiles PM To Karen olumbiaGas Phil olumbiaGas cc Paul olumbiaGas Noel olumbiaGas Melissa olumbiaGas Brian olumbiaGas Frank olumbiaGas Subject FINAL January Tn Zn volumes Here are the January daily volumes for each of the gates I know you wanted an exact volume for but I will not have that for all Tennessee Zn markets until Thursday as Boston Gas and S Ct Algorithms will be available then I have estimates in on those gates We will need a range from dth to dth per day This large swing is normal for these types of markets due to weekends weather and customer situations

FINAL JANUARY NEEDSForwarded by Paul DrexeliusCESColumbiaGas on AM KIM NOVSEK BIZIK AM To Morgan olumbiaGas Dale Ray olumbiaGas Phil olumbiaGas Darren olumbiaGas cc Marianne olumbiaGas Joanne olumbiaGas Noel olumbiaGas Paul olumbiaGas Subject FINAL JANUARY NEEDS The volumes listed below are Final volumes note that the deadline for BUG has changed I still need to give you Peco volumes Forwarded by Kim Novsek BizikCESColumbiaGas on AM KIM NOVSEK BIZIK AM To Morgan olumbiaGas Dale Ray olumbiaGas Phil olumbiaGas Darren olumbiaGas cc Marianne olumbiaGas Joanne olumbiaGas Noel olumbiaGas Paul olumbiaGas Subject JANUARY NEEDS Good Morning I have listed my needs below for all but Peco The red can be off Anr or Tgt Please advise The green is done just need the activity number I have also included my nom deadline I have a nom due today LILCO Please advise ANR CGE deliveries to Springboro dthday LDC Nom Deadline is on the th note this can be served off TGT Tetco BUG dthday LDC Nom Deadline is noon on the th Con Ed dthday estimate ONLY LDC Nom Deadline is pm on the th PECO PA Gas PSEG dthday LDC Nom Deadline is pm on the th Etown dthday LDC Nom Deadline is noon on the th NJN dthday LDC Nom Deadline is est on the th CNG PA gas for PECO day If we have a problem flowing this much please let me know as soon as possible so we can buy delivered gas to PECOs gate from one of the other suppliers Transco LILCO dthday capacity release is also for LDC Nom Deadline is noon on the th PSEG dthday LDC Nom Deadline is pm on the th S Jersey dthday Transco nom must show Enduser to be confirmed LDC Deadline is on the th Piedmont dthday LDC Nom Deadline was est on the nd just need activity number now PSNC dthday CES will get the capacity release for this from PSNC The supply will be from PSNCs pool this is their station pool Texas Gas DPL dthday LDC Nom Deadline is est on the th CGE dthday LDC Nom Deadline is on the th note this can be served off TGT

January AGT volumesForwarded by Paul DrexeliusCESColumbiaGas on AM Marianne Stiles PM To Phil olumbiaGas cc Paul olumbiaGas Noel olumbiaGas Joanne olumbiaGas Frank olumbiaGas Brian olumbiaGas Melissa olumbiaGas Morgan olumbiaGas Subject January AGT volumes Here are the approximate January daily volumes for each of the gates Please do not forget that January and January will be lower because of the weekendholiday I know you wanted an exact volume for but I will not have that for all of the Algonquin markets until Monday We will need a range from dth to dth per day This large swing is normal for these types of markets due to weekends weather and customer situations agtxls

January Tn Zn volumesForwarded by Paul DrexeliusCESColumbiaGas on AM Marianne Stiles PM To Karen olumbiaGas Phil olumbiaGas cc Paul olumbiaGas Noel olumbiaGas Melissa olumbiaGas Brian olumbiaGas Frank olumbiaGas Subject January Tn Zn volumes Here are the approximate January daily volumes for each of the gates Please do not forget that January and January will be lower because of the weekendholiday I know you wanted an exact volume for but I will not have that for all Tennessee Zn markets until Monday We will need a range from dth to dth per day This large swing is normal for these types of markets due to weekends weather and customer situations tnxls

Jan UGI NominationsForwarded by Paul DrexeliusCESColumbiaGas on AM KIM NOVSEK BIZIK AM To Phil olumbiaGas cc Noel olumbiaGas Paul olumbiaGas Marianne olumbiaGas Joanne olumbiaGas John olumbiaGas Subject Jan UGI Nominations Hi For the month of January UGI will pull from the ELA Tabs and deliver to UGIs citygate for CES endusers The daily volumes I have listed below are delivered volumes January January dth per day January January dth per day It is not definite that the increase will occur on January th or the volume of the increase That is an estimate Bayer will give us a better idea at the beginning of January Please let me know if you have any questions Thank you
